definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: Memories of culture are kept in streets and alleys of Taichung City.
sentences.chinese: 文化的记忆也保存在台中市的街头巷弄里。

sentences.english: Do you live in a suburb of Taichung?
sentences.chinese: 你住在台中市的郊区吗？

sentences.english: Xinzhu was rated the most liveable place behind Taipei, followed by Tainan and Taizhong cities.
sentences.chinese: 新竹的名次仅次于台北，接著是台南及台中市。

sentences.english: This photo shows the outside of Taichung Rear Station in Taichung City.
sentences.chinese: 这张图显示在台中市的台中后站外面景象。

sentences.english: The office is based in the Beitun District of Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 公司的位置在台中市北屯区。

sentences.english: He is currently staying in Taichung and teaching in Tung Shan High School.
sentences.chinese: 他现居于台中并于台中市立东山高中教授英文。

definition: Tainan city in Tainan county 臺南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Kaohsiung or Gaoxiong city in south Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
New Taipei City, administrative district in north Taiwan, formerly 臺北縣|台北县[Tai2 bei3 xian4]
Taoyuan city in north Taiwan, capital of Taoyuan county
Chilung or Keelung, city and major port in north Taiwan
Zhanghua or Changhua county in west Taiwan
Hsinchu, city in north Taiwan noted for its high tech industries
Xinzhu or Hsinchu County in northwest Taiwan
Jiayi or Chiayi county in west Taiwan
Zhanghua or Changhua city in west Taiwan, capital of Changhua county
